Theme settings to aid development, automatically disabled on themes that include PRODUCTION in their name (case-insensitive)

settings.label: Remove preview bar
settings.info: Prevent Shopify from injecting the preview bar, no preview bar JS or CSS is loaded

settings.label: Remove custom preview bar
settings.info: Hide the custom replacement preview bar

settings.label: Disable Canvas
settings.info: Completely disable all Canvas functionality including Vue, Vuex, and async component style injection

settings.label: Disable async components
settings.info: Prevent async components from changing to 'active' state, use to preview the static loading template

settings.label: Disable component ready state
settings.info: Prevent a component's state changing from 'loading' to 'ready', manually add an early return to prevent changing state after loading object in your methods, [see documentation](https://www.notion.so/wemakewebsites/Components-dbc74cac0f2b4049bd5c9d27ea0fab55#a66fd19677a1405ea3f1c205d711db62)

settings.label: Disable Vuex persisted state
settings.info: Prevent Vuex state from persisting between page loads, this will not delete existing persisted states

settings.label: Disable overlays dismissed state
settings.info: Ignore the overlays dismissed state so overlays can appear without clearing localStorage

settings.label: Disable theme styles
settings.info: Disable non-component stylesheets from loading, except critical styles

settings.label: Enable infinite scroll
settings.info: Loads in more products on collection and search pages automatically on scroll

settings.label: Enable product reviews
settings.info: Show Shopify review badges and content on product cards and product page.

settings.label: Enable alternative image hovers on product cards
settings.info: Show an alternate image when product cards on hover.

settings.label: Enable store selector
settings.info: Enable store selector in site footer.

settings.label: Enable currency converter
settings.info: Use Fixer.io currency conversion rates. Disable if using Shopify Multi-Currency.

settings.label: Enable currency selector
settings.info: Show a currency selector in the site footer. Currency converter must be enabled if Shopify Multi-Currency is not enabled.

settings.label: Enable redirect modal
settings.info: Show redirect modal for users browsing outside the country defined in the Store Settings store code field.

settings.info: Type country codes, comma separated, to display in the Country/Region dropdown. Leave blank to not display dropdown. Example: US,UK,CA

settings.label: Enable Quantity Limit
settings.info: Enable quantity limits for how many products can be added to cart. If changed the script "Product Quantity Limit" must also be published/unpublished in the Script Editor app to match this setting.

settings.label: Quantity limit value
settings.info: Set the global quantity limit. If updated the script "Product Quantity Limit" must also be updated in the Script Editor app.
